text.autoconfig.gamma_utils.title: Gamma Utils Config
text.autoconfig.gamma_utils.option.defau:
Gamma percentage for when 
the mod is toggled off
text.autoconfig.gamma_utils.option.toggl:
Gamma percentage for when 
the mod is toggled on
text.autoconfig.gamma_utils.option.smoot:
Make the transition of 
toggling gamma smoother
text.autoconfig.gamma_utils.option.updat:
Enabling this will make the 
toggle value remember the last 
non default value you've used
text.autoconfig.gamma_utils.option.showS:
Show a status effect when the gamma 
percentage is outside normal range 
- "High Gamma" above 100% 
- "Low Gamma" below 0%
text.autoconfig.gamma_utils.option.advan:
Speed in gamma percentage per second 
(when Smooth Transition is enabled)

Should the mod enforce the 
minimum and maximum gamma limits

Minimum gamma percentage the mod will 
allow if the Limit Check is enabled

Maximum gamma percentage the mod will 
allow if the Limit Check is enabled

Gamma percentage change for 
every increase or decrease

Show a message with the new gamma value 
when the gamma has changed

Reset the gamma value to default 
when Minecraft closes
